title: Celebrating The Opening of San Francisco Office
author: Arianna Paranzino
summary: EliseAI announces the opening of its new office in San Francisco, marking a significant milestone in its growth and commitment to AI innovation in the real estate and healthcare industries.
main_content:
# EliseAI Celebrates Opening of San Francisco Office

EliseAI, the leader in AI solutions for the real estate and healthcare industries, is proud to announce the opening of its office in San Francisco, California. This expansion marks a significant milestone in the company’s growth journey and underscores its dedication to building the most sophisticated AI products in the market.

Located in the vibrant SoMa district, the new office will serve as a hub for software engineering, sales, customer success, strategy and operations, and leadership roles. With this strategic expansion, EliseAI will leverage the Bay Area’s deep pool of tech talent and further solidify its position as an industry leader in AI innovation.

“Opening our San Francisco office is an exciting step forward for EliseAI,” said Minna Song, CEO of EliseAI. “This new location will enable us to strengthen relationships with West Coast clients, attract top-tier talent, and accelerate the development of our cutting-edge AI solutions.”

The San Francisco office will complement EliseAI’s headquarters in New York City, creating a bicoastal presence that promotes seamless collaboration across teams and time zones. It also reinforces the company’s commitment to delivering powerful technology that empowers property management and healthcare professionals to improve operational efficiency, enhance consumer experiences, and drive business growth.

This expansion comes during a period of rapid growth for EliseAI, fueled by the increased adoption of AI by real estate and healthcare companies nationwide.

EliseAI is actively hiring for a variety of roles in its San Francisco and New York offices. To learn more about career opportunities at EliseAI, visit [https://www.eliseai.com/careers](https://www.eliseai.com/careers).
